metadata.name: Moderna Madonna
metadata.description:
A mysterious woman appears in the middle of her native city, with traffic and buildings in the background. She is immerged in her thoughts, exploring the threads of life with repetitive gestures like a ritual, expressing our contemporary lives. She is our Moderna Madonna.

Size: 30 x 47 cm 
Date : 22 June 2022

Moderna Madonna is the first appearance of this artwork by Catherine Gfeller, which is her first NFT creation.
